Med Spring Gala Performances

10 Mar 2020

I enjoy playing the piano, and have performed on a few occasions at the UBC Medicine Spring Gala. Here are the associated recordings.

  • Trio in D Minor, Op. 49 no. 1, Mvt. I (Abridged) by Felix Mendelssohn, performed with Sabine Lague (on flute) and Santa Ono (on cello).
  • Sonate pour flûte et piano (Flute Sonata), FP 164, by Francis Poulenc, performed with Sabine Lague (on flute).
  • “Un Sospiro,” 3 Études de concert, S.144 No. 3 (Liszt, Franz)
